subject: Re: Uploaded my favorite "Manual Radio-Sweep Conversation
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hi Debbie,

I did hear it, very good communication. I have never worked with DC6 
live. It sounds very robotic, is that the program causing that or did 
it come from editing?

If it came from editing, your way over processing the recording.
Still great communication.

Bruce





--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "misujoey" <Debbie@...> wrote:
>
> I recorded this sweeping manually and listening via DC6 "LIVE" ... 
Hope 
> you're able to hear it ..
> 
> Debbie
